rows.label: qst712002_msg0001
rows.name:
What is it? A look of hesitation
is not like you all.

rows.label: qst712002_msg0002
rows.name:
Hmm? You want a review of the
third-stage Blade Combo? Very well...

rows.label: qst712002_msg0003
rows.name:
As I said last time, a Blade Combo is a
combination of Specials, and the basic method
for the third stage is the same as the second.

rows.label: qst712002_msg0004
rows.name:
If you activate Specials in the order of level
I, level II or higher, and level III or higher,
a third-stage Blade Combo will occur.

rows.label: qst712002_msg0005
rows.name:
Also, for those of you who cleared
the last test, I must tell you
about the "critical route."

rows.label: qst712002_msg0006
rows.name:
A critical route is a Blade Combo that
deals higher than normal damage when you
use a Special of a specific element.

rows.label: qst712002_msg0007
rows.name:
As far as I know, a critical route is
activated when you use Specials in the
order of "Fire" > "Fire" > "Light."

rows.label: qst712002_msg0008
rows.name:
But there are many more critical
routes, so it might be a good idea
to look for them on this test.

rows.label: qst712002_msg0009
rows.name:
Note that whether you activate a critical
route or not will not be part of the
evaluation for this test, so don't worry.

rows.label: qst712002_msg0010
rows.name:
Of course, any pattern of Blade
Combo will count as one as long as
you connect it to the third stage.

rows.label: qst712002_msg0011
rows.name:
Also, as before, the location and target
don't matter. Feel free to practice it in
a place and against an opponent you like.

rows.label: qst712002_msg0012
rows.name: Well then, I have high hopes for you.

rows.label: qst712002_msg0102
rows.name:
I had high hopes, but I never
thought someone would actually
pass this test...!

rows.label: qst712002_msg0103
rows.name:
There is probably no one else
but you all who can accompany
us on our next mission.

rows.label: qst712002_msg0104
rows.name:
The final decision is up to
my Driver, Gororo, but I'm
sure he will like you all.

rows.label: qst712002_msg0105
rows.name:
We are scheduled to meet
with Gororo in a region
of Iira called Aletta.

rows.label: qst712002_msg0106
rows.name:
If you all happen to stop by
Aletta, please let us know.
